com.badlogic.gdx.math
Class EarCutTriangulator

java.lang.Object
  com.badlogic.gdx.math.EarCutTriangulator

public final class EarCutTriangulator
extends java.lang.Object

A simple implementation of the ear cutting algorithm to triangulate simple polygons without holes. For more information see http://cgm.cs.mcgill.ca/~godfried/teaching/cg-projects/97/Ian/algorithm2.html

Author:
mzechner

triangulate

public java.util.List<Vector> triangulate(java.util.List<Vector> polygon)
Triangulates the list of points and returns an array of Vector triples that each form a single triangle.
